name: outdent
description: Remove leading indentation from ES6 template literals.

scripts.test: npm run-script build && mocha && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.prepublish: if [ "$NPM_SKIP_PREPUBLISH" != "1" ]; then ( echo Cleaning and installing && npm run-script clean && NPM_SKIP_PREPUBLISH=1 npm install && npm test ) ; else echo skipping recursive prepublish ; fi

author: Andrew Bradley <cspotcode@gmail.com>
